cards.shortText: The Catalyst style of feedback feels like discovery...
cards.cardSummary: The Catalyst style of feedback feels like discovery. It helps us find potential we didn't know we had. We have been coached towards it, but we know we arrived at our conclusion by ourselves and we own the action we take.
prosReceivers: We understand the action we're going to take, and why, and we can apply the reasoning again in similar situations.
consReceivers: Can be frustrating and time consuming for practical minds.
This feedback might be useless in the moment.
It won't quickly tell you what action to take next.
